title: fix: use shared OVHCLOUD_API_KEY for Mistral endpoint
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Corrected the API key configuration for Mistral models to ensure reliable connectivity with OVHcloud.
gist.impact: Ensures stable and reliable access to Mistral text generation models for all users.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee fixing a connection in the clouds. Mistral is often associated with wind, so a cloud server blowing gentle wind pixels being repaired with a golden key represents the API key fix.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee inserting a glowing golden key into a fluffy cloud server labeled 'Mistral'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. The cloud is gently blowing wind pixels. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee inserting a glowing golden key into a fluffy cloud server labeled 'Mistral'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. The cloud is gently blowing wind pixels. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
